description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Warsaw, Poland. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Five-Star Warsaw Escape near UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Old Town
hotels.description: Discover Poland’s many wonders with a five-star stay at InterContinental Warsaw, an IHG Hotel. Located directly opposite the city’s iconic Palace of Culture and Science and minutes from the elegant gardens of Warsaw’s UNESCO-listed Old Town, the modern hotel is the perfect base to discover the best of Poland’s capital. Savour modern Polish cuisine on handmade plates at Platter by Karol Okrasa or laze by the hotel's shimmering rooftop pool for unbeatable city views.

hotels.title: Refined Warsaw Retreat with Rooftop Bar and Dazzling Views
hotels.description: In the beating heart of this dynamic city, Crowne Plaza Warsaw - The Hub, an IHG Hotel, is an urban haven boasting captivating views and refined dining. Feast on authentic Polish cuisine with locally sourced and foraged ingredients at Nova Wola restaurant, or refresh body and mind at the fitness centre. Visit heritage attractions and vibrant cafes, bars and restaurants before indulging in an expertly mixed cocktail on the sky-high outdoor terrace of The Roof Bar, gazing out over Warsaw.

seo.title: Hôtels à Warsaw - Poland Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Warsaw, Poland avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
